comp_weaknesses.weakness: Loyalty discount removals and billing increases
comp_weaknesses.action_suggestion: Reintroduce loyalty discounts and improve transparency in billing communication

comp_weaknesses.weakness: App performance issues and poor customer service
comp_weaknesses.action_suggestion: Invest in app optimization and enhance customer support training

tmobile_critiques.critique: App functionality issues (e.g., misleading 'free' features, insurance problems)
tmobile_critiques.source_impact: Google Play Store (5 negative reviews), Apple App Store (4 negative reviews)
tmobile_critiques.team_suggestion: Prioritize UI/UX improvements and clarify feature pricing in-app

tmobile_critiques.critique: Employee pay cuts and unrealistic sales goals
tmobile_critiques.team_suggestion: Revise compensation structures and align sales targets with employee feedback
